text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1995. ==Events== *12 March - Frédéric Etherlinck is selected to represent Belgium at the 1995 Eurovision Song Contest with his song "La voix est libre". He is selected to be the thirty-ninth Belgian Eurovision entry during Eurosong held at the RTBF Studios in Brussels. ==Debuts== *23 December - Thuis (1995–present) ==Television shows== ===1990s=== *Samson en Gert (1990–present) *Familie (1991–present) *Wittekerke (1993-2008) ==Ending this year== *VTM Soundmixshow (1989-1995, 1997-) ==Births== ==Deaths==
title: 1995 in Belgian television
